articles.description: The mystery of the weird desert statue may have been solved in advance of The Game Awards on Thursday, as some newly registered trademarks reveal a game and a logo from a familiar franchise that looks essentially identical to a symbol on the monolith.

articles.title: The AirPods Pro 3 are back to their lowest price ahead of the holidays - The Verge
articles.description: Apple’s AirPods Pro 3 are back down to their lowest price yet of $219.99 ($30 off). We also found deals on Silent Hill F and a great rechargeable flashlight.
